summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 8th Avenue, from Olive Street to Stewart Street, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with brick laid upon a proper concrete foundation; by constructing brick gutters, armored concrete curbs with granite corners and including as a part of said work the construction or reconstruction of all sewers, side sewers and watermains, and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage, water service and fire protection of said district; all in accordance with Resolution No. 4515, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
